scenario.situation: A few players are playing a boardgame. The current state of the game is as follows. The llama enjoys the company of the badger, and takes over the emperor of the worm. And the rules of the game are as follows. Rule1: The liger unquestionably hugs the frog, in the case where the llama dances with the liger. Rule2: This is a basic rule: if the bison surrenders to the liger, then the conclusion that "the liger will not hug the frog" follows immediately and effectively. Rule3: Are you certain that one of the animals enjoys the companionship of the badger and also at the same time takes over the emperor of the worm? Then you can also be certain that the same animal dances with the liger. Rule2 is preferred over Rule1.
